Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: C. Johnson
Reviews.Content: The single processor made this tablet too slow to be functional.  I was able to familiarize myself with using a tablet, but then bought one with a dual processor.

Reviews.Title: Unresponsive Seller !!!
Reviews.Author: Bill M.
Reviews.Content: This item stopped working in three months, as it was a gift I had no warranty info. I called the seller for the information and they never responded. The extended warranty I also bought is only good after the original warranty expires but since I don't know who to contact ? It was a waste of money, a Kindle would have been a better choice.This seller has no email contact information available, only a phone number, don't buy from them!
